oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Curtiss-Wright technical demonstration
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Participants gather around a mechanical set-up that is just visible on the left side of the photograph. The group was gathered for a celebration of the 15,000th pursuit plane produced by the Curtiss-Wright Corporation for the Allied war efforts during World War II.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: World War, 1939-1945; United States. Army. Air Corps; Curtiss-Wright aircraft; Air pilots
